titleStmt.title: A table-booke for princes Containing short remembrances for the gouernment of themselues and their empire. Wherein also respectiuely the seuerall members of state, and all sorts of subiects, may finde matter worthy their obseruation. By Patricke Scot, Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Scot, Patrick.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Bernard Alsop, dwelling in Distaffe-Lane at the signe of the Dolphin, neere Olde Fish-street,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last two leaves are blank.
Running title reads: A table booke for princes.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: Distaffe-Lane at the signe of the Dolphin, neere Olde Fish-street
